FuncDef: The display sbom brief command displays board models on a device.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check all board models on a device, run the display sbom brief command.
Models of the following boards and subcards can be displayed:
Boards: main control boards, interface boards, and switching fabric boards (integrated switching fabric boards excluded)Subcards: flexible plug-in cards (those on unpluggable boards excluded)
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
